original_text: But if someone says to you, “This has been offered in sacrifice,” then do not eat it, both for the sake of the one who told you and for the sake of conscience.
korean_text: 누가 너희에게 이것이 제물이라 말하거든 알게 한 자와 그 양심을 위하여 먹지 말라

sentences.original_text: But if someone says to you
This has been offered in sacrifice
both for the sake of the one who told you
and for the sake of conscience
